amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce from 110 acres to 5 acres the total amount of acreage which can be acquired for the Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-165 to reduce the total amount of acreage which can be acquired for the Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site form 115 acres to 5 (for use as a visitor center and parking lot).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
